sentences.en: After a pause Alex said sharply: "I'm sorry if I've upset you"
sentences.cn: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

sentences.en: Any faults in the original cider stood out sharply after distillation.
sentences.cn: 原先苹果酒里的任何杂质在蒸馏后都会凸现出来。

sentences.en: Her story is sharply evocative of Italian provincial life.
sentences.cn: 她的故事让人清晰地回忆起意大利的乡村生活。

sentences.en: I turned my body sharply in the chair.
sentences.cn: 我在椅子上突然转过身子。

sentences.en: In early trading in Tokyo, the dollar fell sharply against the yen.
sentences.cn: 在东京市场早市开盘时，美元对日元的比价急剧下跌。

sentences.en: Johnson's easy charm contrasted sharply with the prickliness of his boss.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊的亲和力和他老板易怒的性格形成了鲜明的对比。

sentences.en: On either side of the tracks the ground fell away sharply.
sentences.cn: 跑道两侧都是很陡的斜坡。

sentences.en: Opinions on this are sharply divided.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上分歧很大。

sentences.en: Retailers will have to mark down prices sharply to bring in sales.
sentences.cn: 零售商将不得不为了提高销量而大幅降价。

sentences.en: Rose drew her breath in sharply.
She was thin and spare, with a sharply intelligent face.
sentences.cn: 她又高又瘦，一副精明过人的模样。

sentences.en: She wheeled sharply and headed for the check-out counter.
sentences.cn: 她突然转身，朝收银台走去。

sentences.en: The guard stopped his humming and turned his head sharply.
sentences.cn: 守卫停止了哼唱，猛地转过头。

sentences.en: The report was sharply critical of the police.
sentences.cn: 报道猛烈地抨击了警方。

sentences.en: The woman's figure is sharply brought out by the intense light.
sentences.cn: 在强光照射下，那女子的身材清晰可见。

sentences.en: Unemployment among the over forties has risen sharply in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年40岁以上的人的失业率大幅上升。

锐利；[摄] 清晰度；疾速；严厉

trans.tran_cn: 严厉地，明确地，锋利地，突然地
trans.tran_en: in a critical, rough or severe way
